document_data.title: Moving Day
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Moving Day''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Waterdeep|Waterdeep]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on [[Undermountain]], and is an adventure designed for 17{{th}}- to 20{{th}}-level characters. It is part three of the ''Home Sweet Home'' Trilogy.

{{Quote|''You must transport the Baron of Blood (sealed within his coffin) to his new home. Unfortunately, his new neighbors are not happy to see him move in, and the Mad Mage himself wants to throw him a housewarming party.''|}}
